cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Foreign Affairs on March 25, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 256, To Repeal the Authorization for Use of Military Force Against Iraq Resolution of 2002

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 6 (Monday, January 11, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. LEE of California:
H.R. 256.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
This bill is enacted pursuant to the power granted to
Congress under Article I of the United States Constitution
and its subsequent amendments, and further clarified and
interpreted by the Supreme Court of the United States.
[Page H124]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

title: To repeal the Authorization for Use of Military Force Against Iraq Resolution of 2002.
